metadata.title: Estimation of distribution-based multiobjective design space exploration for energy and throughput-optimized MPSoCs

tables.table_title: Table 1 shows the Pareto-efficient values of the three decision variables of cache size, number of cores, and frequency along with energy consumption and throughput associated with each of the Pareto-efficient solutions and Figure 1 shows the obtained Pareto front. Thus, an efficient and acceptable solution can be selected from the obtained Pareto front by using an expert opinion.
The three configurations: default, throughput-efficient, and energy-efficient (EE).
